channel.title: Looking for web-developer new big project [Desire-x] asap
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UDWcP.png[/img][/center] [size=14pt][b][u]Hello Fellow moparians,[/u][/b] [/size]
[size=18pt]I have created a team called desire-x we have alot of money backing us and its going to be a massive project where undecided on what were doing with it in like if its rs2 or rsc but we are starting with the website, so were currently looking for a webdeveloper i have already started the site but im not the greatest but heres a screenshot of progress on it so far.
[/size][img]http://i.imgur.com/2Mgjk.png[/img]
[size=18pt]as you can see its not near completion but thats why we need someone to develop it i have done the basics and if your interested in joining either add me on skype georgehansell or pm me asap rewards ivolved..Please fill this in if your interested
Name:[/size] [size=14pt]experience 1-10 : Age : Maturity level : How often you can be on : Why your interested : Thanks guys get back to us asap as this place wont be open for long :D[/size]

item.title: Looking for web-developer new big project [Desire-x] asap
item.dc:creator: @General_Pony General Pony
item.description:
@General_Pony wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:5, topic:460135”][quote author=General Pony link=topic=563050.msg4104884#msg4104884 date=1347852154]
Dat Site, Those Tables…

Learn to use CSS
[/quote]

It’s a technique that Ive seen used a lot, it’s only to show placement of everything not to actually be a feature in the website.[/quote]

I understand what you are saying, as i use tables sometimes myself as place holders when i’m working on something server side rather then a frontend system. But it looks to me as this is a permanent solution for OP as he is obviously on the novice side of things.

My final note to OP:
Don’t use tables as a long term solution as i said before, it’s fine using them as place holders as Ruby mentions; but remember to use Css for any project you expect to release.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for web-developer new big project [Desire-x] asap
